For A list of strings or numbers separated by spaces; A list in the format <value:text value:text value:text> where value is a string | a number and text can be a string | a number | a FormattedText object | an image? option1 option2 option3 (or *option1 *option2 *option3 if all 3 were to be checked)

The name of a Python or Gooey function to call when the object is acted upon
A boolean indicating whether the object is hidden (True | true | False | false)
